00031   MipTrackFinder::MipTrackFinder() : Processor("MipTrackFinder")
00032   {
00033     _description = "Processor to find track from a MIP";
00034 
00035     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00036                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides"
00037                                 " the geometry of the detector." ,
00038                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00039                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00040 
00041     registerProcessorParameter( "CellDescriptionProcessorName" ,
00042                                 "name of CellDescriptionProcessor which takes care of the cell description generation",
00043                                 _cellDescriptionProcessorName,
00044                                 std::string("MyCellDescriptionProcessor") ) ;
00045 
00046     registerProcessorParameter("AHCALInputCollectionName",
00047                                "Name of the collection of the AHCAL hits",
00048                                _ahcalInputColName,
00049                                std::string("AhcCalorimeter_Hits"));
00050 
00051     registerProcessorParameter("AmplitudeHCALInputCollectionName",
00052                                "Name of the AHCAL Amplitude Collection",
00053                                _ahcalAmpInputColName,
00054                                std::string("AhcHitAmplitudeRelation"));
00055 
00056     registerProcessorParameter("AHCALTrackOutputCollectionName",
00057                                "Name of the collection of the tracks found "
00058                                "in the AHCAL",
00059                                _ahcalOutputTrackColName,
00060                                std::string("AhcTrackClusters"));
00061 
00062     registerProcessorParameter("UseECALandTCMT", "Use ECAL and TCMT input hits",
00063                                _useECALandTCMT, bool(false));
00064 
00065     registerProcessorParameter("TCMInputCollectionName", "Name of the TCMT input collection",
00066                                _tcmtInputColName, std::string("TcmtCalorimeter_Hits"));
00067 
00068     registerProcessorParameter("ECALInputCollectionName", "Name of the ECAL input collection",
00069                                _ecalInputColName,
00070                                std::string("EmcCalorimeter_Hits"));
00071 
00072     registerProcessorParameter("IsNonMuonRun", "Is this a non-muon run?",
00073                                _isNonMuonRun, bool(false));
00074 
00075     registerProcessorParameter("MaxAHCALNoHits", "Maximum number of hits in the AHCAL, used for a non-muon run",
00076                                _ahcalMaxNoHits, int(100));
00077 
00078     registerProcessorParameter("MinECALNoHits", "Minimum number of hits in the ECAL",
00079                                _ecalMinNoHits, int(30));
00080 
00081     registerProcessorParameter("MaxECALNoHits", "Maximum number of hits in the ECAL",
00082                                _ecalMaxNoHits, int(34));
00083 
00084     registerProcessorParameter("MinTCMTEnergySum", "Minimum energy sum in the TCMT",
00085                                _tcmtMinEnergySum, float(10));
00086 
00087     registerProcessorParameter("MipCutValue", "Minimum energy in MIPs",
00088                                _mipCutValue, float(0.5));
00089 
00090     registerProcessorParameter("MipCutVariable", "use (0) pure raw/MIP or (1) raw/MIP after whole calibration chain",
00091                                _mipCutVariable, int(0));
00092     IntVec badAhcalModulesVec;
00093     registerProcessorParameter("AHCALBadModules", "List of bad AHCAL modules which need to be excluded",
00094                                _badAhcalModulesVec, badAhcalModulesVec);
00095 
00096     IntVec firstAhcalModulesVec;
00097     registerProcessorParameter("AHCALFirstModules", "List of beginning AHCAL modules which are used"
00098                                " for perpendicular track finding",
00099                                _firstAhcalModulesVec, firstAhcalModulesVec);
00100 
00101     IntVec lastAhcalModulesVec;
00102     registerProcessorParameter("AHCALLastModules", "List of ending AHCAL modules which are used"
00103                                " for perpendicular track finding",
00104                                _lastAhcalModulesVec, lastAhcalModulesVec);
00105 
00106     registerProcessorParameter("TrackSelectionMode", "Track selection mode: "
00107                                "NHITS = based on the number of hits; "
00108                                "PERPENDICULAR = select only perpendicular tracks",
00109                                _trackSelectionMode,
00110                                std::string("NHITS"));
00111 
00112     registerProcessorParameter("TrackNoHitsThreshold","Threshold on the number of hits a track "
00113                                "is considered to be a muon track (used only with TrackSelectionMode=NHITS)",
00114                                _trackNoHitsThreshold, int(20));
00115   }

00125   /******************************************************************************/
00126   /*                                                                            */
00127   /*                                                                            */
00128   /*                                                                            */
00129   /******************************************************************************/
00130   void MipTrackFinder::init()
00131   {
00132     printParameters();
00133 
00134     std::stringstream message;
00135     bool error = false;
00136 
00137     _mapper = dynamic_cast<const Mapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00138     if ( !_mapper )
00139       {
00140         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName
00141                 << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00142         error = true;
00143       }
00144 
00145     _cellDescriptions = CALICE::CellDescriptionProcessor::getCellDescriptions(_cellDescriptionProcessorName);
00146     if ( ! _cellDescriptions )
00147       {
00148         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot obtain cell descriptions from CellDescriptionsProcessor "
00149                      <<_cellDescriptionProcessorName<<". Maybe, processor is not present"
00150                      << std::endl;
00151         error = true;
00152       }
00153 
00154 
00155     if (error)
00156       {
00157         streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00158         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00159       }
00160 
00161   }
00162 
00163   /******************************************************************************/
00164   /*                                                                            */
00165   /*                                                                            */
00166   /*                                                                            */
00167   /******************************************************************************/
00168   void MipTrackFinder::processEvent(LCEvent* evt)
00169   {
00170 
00171     streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "\n\n============================= Processing event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00172 
00173     /* Get the incoming collections*/
00174     openInputCollections(evt);
00175 
00176     /* Start the track finding*/
00177     findTrack(evt);
00178 
00179     /* Clear vectors*/
00180     _allAhcalHitsInEventVec.clear();
00181 
00182   }
00183 
00184   /******************************************************************************/
00185   /*                                                                            */
00186   /*                                                                            */
00187   /*                                                                            */
00188   /******************************************************************************/
00189   void MipTrackFinder::openInputCollections(LCEvent* evt)
00190   {
00191     try
00192       {
00193         if(_useECALandTCMT == true)
00194           {
00195             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "Opening ECAL collection "<<_ecalInputColName
00196                           << "and TCMT collection " << _tcmtInputColName<< endl;
00197 
00198             _ecalInputCol = evt->getCollection(_ecalInputColName);
00199             _tcmtInputCol = evt->getCollection(_tcmtInputColName);
00200           }
00201 
00202         // Hcal collection
00203         _ahcalInputCol = evt->getCollection(_ahcalInputColName);
00204         // Amplitude relation
00205         _ahcalAmpInputCol = evt->getCollection(_ahcalAmpInputColName);
00206 
00207         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "Opening AHCAL collection " << _ahcalInputColName
00208                       <<" with "<<_ahcalInputCol->getNumberOfElements() <<" hits"
00209                       << endl;
00210 
00211       }
00212     catch(DataNotAvailableException &e)
00213       {
00214         streamlog_out(WARNING) << "At least one required collection is missing:\n "
00215                        <<_ahcalInputColName<<", "<<_ecalInputColName
00216                        <<" or "<<_tcmtInputColName
00217                        <<" in the event "<<evt->getEventNumber()
00218                        << endl;
00219 
00220         throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00221       }
00222 
00223   }
00224 
00225   /******************************************************************************/
00226   /*                                                                            */
00227   /*                                                                            */
00228   /*                                                                            */
00229   /******************************************************************************/
00230   void MipTrackFinder::findTrack(LCEvent* evt)
00231   {
00232     streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "\n\n ============ Start to find track in event " << evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00233     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" doFurtherAnalysis(): "<<endl;
00234 
00235     if(this->doFurtherAnalysis() == true )
00236       {
00237         /* All hits above 0.5 MIP are filled into the vector hits.*/
00238         LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> hcalHitsVec = this->extractAHCALInformation();
00239 
00240         /* All hits above 0.5 MIP which are recognized as a track are
00241            in this vector of ClusterVec*/
00242         EVENT::ClusterVec trackClusterVec = this->findTrackClusters(hcalHitsVec);
00243 
00244         /* This vector holds the selected tracks */
00245         EVENT::ClusterVec selectedClusterVec = this->selectTrackClusters(trackClusterVec, _trackSelectionMode);
00246 
00247         /* This vector has also the remaining hits*/
00248         EVENT::ClusterVec outputTrackClusterVec = this->getRemainingHits(selectedClusterVec);
00249 
00250         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << outputTrackClusterVec.size() << " found tracks" << endl;
00251 
00252         /* append event parameters with track information */
00253         appendParameters(evt, outputTrackClusterVec);
00254 
00255         /* Attach the final tracks to the event.*/
00256         createOutputCollection(evt, outputTrackClusterVec);
00257       }
00258     else
00259       {
00260         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "Criteria for further analysis not reached." << endl;
00261         /* Do nothing.*/
00262       }
00263 
00264   }
00265 
00266 
00267 
00268   /******************************************************************************/
00269   /*                                                                            */
00270   /*                                                                            */
00271   /*                                                                            */
00272   /******************************************************************************/
00273   bool MipTrackFinder::doFurtherAnalysis()
00274   {
00275     /* here apply criteria to use the number of hits in HCAL to  apply the muon*/
00276     bool analyse = false;
00277 
00278     if(_useECALandTCMT == true)
00279       {
00280         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "Using ECAL and TCMT information" << endl;
00281 
00282         /* ECAL information*/
00283         std::pair<int, float> nhits_and_esum(extractNumberOfHitsAndEnergySum(_ecalInputCol));
00284         int ecalNumberOfHits = nhits_and_esum.first;
00285 
00286         /* TCMT information*/
00287         nhits_and_esum = extractNumberOfHitsAndEnergySum(_tcmtInputCol);
00288         float tcmtEnergySum = nhits_and_esum.second;
00289 
00290         if((ecalNumberOfHits > _ecalMinNoHits) && (ecalNumberOfHits < _ecalMaxNoHits)
00291            && (tcmtEnergySum > _tcmtMinEnergySum))
00292           {
00293             analyse = true;
00294             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "ECAL and TCMT criteria reached. "
00295                                   << "Going to do further processing." << endl;
00296           }
00297         else
00298           {
00299             analyse = false;
00300             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "ECAL and TCMT criteria *not* reached. "
00301                                   << "Event will be skipped." << endl;
00302           }
00303       }
00304     else
00305       {
00306         if (_isNonMuonRun == true)
00307           {
00308             /* this is just for non-muon runs case!*/
00309             std::pair<int, float> nhits_and_esum(extractNumberOfHitsAndEnergySum(_ahcalInputCol));
00310             int nhits_hcal = nhits_and_esum.first;
00311             streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "hcal hits " << nhits_hcal << endl;
00312 
00313             if (nhits_hcal < _ahcalMaxNoHits)
00314               {
00315                 analyse = true;
00316               }
00317             else
00318               {
00319                 analyse = false;
00320               }
00321           }
00322         else
00323           {
00324             analyse = true;
00325           }
00326         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "  ->AHCAL only analysis will start." << endl;
00327       }
00328 
00329     return analyse;
00330   }
00331

00333 
00334   /******************************************************************************/
00335   /*                                                                            */
00336   /*                                                                            */
00337   /*                                                                            */
00338   /******************************************************************************/
00339   std::pair<int, float> MipTrackFinder::extractNumberOfHitsAndEnergySum(LCCollection *inputCol)
00340   {
00341     float energySum = 0;
00342     const int numberOfHits = inputCol->getNumberOfElements();
00343 
00344     for (int i = 0; i < numberOfHits; ++i)
00345       {
00346         CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inputCol->getElementAt(i));
00347         energySum += hit->getEnergy();
00348       }/*end loop over input collection*/
00349 
00350     return std::pair<int, float>(numberOfHits, energySum);
00351   }
00352 
00353   /******************************************************************************/
00354   /*                                                                            */
00355   /*                                                                            */
00356   /*                                                                            */
00357   /******************************************************************************/
00358   LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> MipTrackFinder::extractAHCALInformation()
00359   {
00360     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"\n extractAHCALInformation:"<<endl;
00361     /*check if there is a list of bad modules*/
00362     bool haveListOfBadModules = parameterSet("AHCALBadModules");
00363 
00364     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"  haveListOfBadModules: "<<haveListOfBadModules<<endl;
00365 
00366     LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> hcalVec(_ahcalInputCol);
00367 
00368 
00369     UTIL::LCRelationNavigator *navigator = NULL;
00370     if (_ahcalAmpInputCol != NULL)
00371       {
00372         navigator = new UTIL::LCRelationNavigator(_ahcalAmpInputCol);
00373       }
00374     else {
00375       std::cout<<" no relation collection, aborting"<<endl;
00376       exit(1);
00377     }
00378 
00379     _allAhcalHitsInEventVec = hcalVec;
00380 
00381 
00382 
00383     /*counter for debug purposes*/
00384     int counter = 0;
00385 
00386     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < hcalVec.size(); ++i)
00387       {
00388         const int cellID = hcalVec[i]->getCellID0();
00389         const int module = _mapper->getModuleFromCellID(cellID);
00390 
00391         bool hitIsInBadModule = false;
00392 
00393         if (haveListOfBadModules == true) {
00394           if (std::find(_badAhcalModulesVec.begin(), _badAhcalModulesVec.end(), module) != _badAhcalModulesVec.end()){
00395             hitIsInBadModule = true;
00396           }
00397 
00398           if ( hitIsInBadModule ){
00399             streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" -> "<<counter<<" hit in module "<< module << "-> on list of bad modules" <<endl;
00400           }
00401           else{
00402             streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" -> "<<counter<<" hit in module "<< module << "-> NOT on list of bad modules" <<endl;
00403           }
00404         }
00405 
00406 
00407         // get the amplitude without temperature correction
00408 
00409         const LCObjectVec &amplVec = navigator->getRelatedToObjects(hcalVec[i]);
00410 
00411         float ampMipNoTempNoSat;
00412         ampMipNoTempNoSat=0.;
00413         if (amplVec.size() > 0)
00414           {
00415             LCGenericObject *obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(amplVec[0]);
00416             AhcAmplitude *ahcAmpl = new AhcAmplitude(obj);
00417             ampMipNoTempNoSat=ahcAmpl->getAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP();
00418             delete ahcAmpl;
00419           }
00420 
00421         // get the amplitude after temperature correction & saturated corrected
00422 
00423         float ampMipFinal;
00424         ampMipFinal=hcalVec[i]->getEnergy();
00425 
00426         // choose amplitude to be used
00427 
00428         float mipCut;
00429         mipCut=0;
00430         if (_mipCutVariable==1){
00431           mipCut=ampMipFinal;
00432         }
00433         else if (_mipCutVariable==0){
00434           mipCut=ampMipNoTempNoSat;
00435         }
00436 
00437         // Now do the selection(!)
00438 
00439         if (
00440             (haveListOfBadModules == true && hitIsInBadModule == true)
00441             || (mipCut < _mipCutValue) )
00442           {
00443             counter++;
00444             hcalVec.erase(hcalVec.begin() + i); /*remove this hit from the vector*/
00445             i--; /* go back one step not to miss the next hit*/
00446           }
00447 
00448       }
00449 
00450     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" -> "<<counter<<" hits do not fullfill MIP cut and/or are in bad modules"<<endl;
00451     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" -> selected AHCAL hits: "<<hcalVec.size()<<endl;
00452 
00453     delete navigator;
00454 
00455     return hcalVec;
00456   }
00457   /******************************************************************************/
00458   /*                                                                            */
00459   /*                                                                            */
00460   /*                                                                            */
00461   /******************************************************************************/
00462   EVENT::ClusterVec MipTrackFinder::findTrackClusters(LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> hcalVec)
00463   {
00464     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"\n--------------- Start to find track clusters"<<endl;
00465 
00466     EVENT::ClusterVec clusterVec;
00467 
00468     LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit>::iterator seedIter = hcalVec.begin();
00469     while(seedIter != hcalVec.end())
00470       {
00471         CalorimeterHit *seedHit = (*seedIter);
00472         const int cellID = seedHit->getCellID0();
00473         /*erase seed hit*/
00474         hcalVec.erase(seedIter);
00475 
00476         /*use only hits in fine modules to find tracks*/
00477         const int K = _mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID);
00478         if (K <= 30)
00479           {
00480             ClusterImpl *cluster = new ClusterImpl;
00481             /*first member of the cluster is the seed hit*/
00482             cluster->addHit(seedHit, 1.);
00483 
00484 
00485             LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit>::iterator potentialTrackHitIter = hcalVec.begin();
00486             while(potentialTrackHitIter != hcalVec.end())
00487               {
00488                 float differenceInX = fabs((*potentialTrackHitIter)->getPosition()[0] - seedHit->getPosition()[0]);
00489                 float differenceInY = fabs((*potentialTrackHitIter)->getPosition()[1] - seedHit->getPosition()[1]);
00490 
00491                 CellDescription* seedHitCellDescription = _cellDescriptions->getByCellID(cellID);
00492                 const float seedHitTileSize = seedHitCellDescription->getSizeX();
00493                 const float potentialTrackHitTileSize =
00494                   _cellDescriptions->getByCellID((*potentialTrackHitIter)->getCellID0())->getSizeX();
00495 
00496                 float meanCellSize  = 0.5 * (potentialTrackHitTileSize + seedHitTileSize);
00497 
00498                 if (differenceInX < meanCellSize && differenceInY < meanCellSize)
00499                   {
00500                     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" New track hit found "<<endl;
00501 
00502                     /*add hit to the track cluster*/
00503                     cluster->addHit((*potentialTrackHitIter), 1.);
00504 
00505                     /*erase track hit from the HCAL seeds vector*/
00506                     potentialTrackHitIter = hcalVec.erase(potentialTrackHitIter);
00507                   }
00508                 else
00509                   {
00510                     ++potentialTrackHitIter;
00511                   }
00512               }/*------------- end loop over potential track hits -------------------*/
00513 
00514             clusterVec.push_back(cluster);
00515           }/*----------------- end loop over fine layers ----------------------------*/
00516 
00517         seedIter = hcalVec.begin();
00518       }/*--------------------- end loop over AHCAL seed hits ------------------------*/
00519 
00520     return clusterVec;
00521   }
00522 
00523 
00524 
00525   /******************************************************************************/
00526   /*                                                                            */
00527   /*                                                                            */
00528   /*                                                                            */
00529   /******************************************************************************/
00530   EVENT::ClusterVec MipTrackFinder::selectTrackClusters(EVENT::ClusterVec clusterVec,
00531                                                         const std::string trackSelectionMode)
00532   {
00533     if (trackSelectionMode == "PERPENDICULAR")
00534       {
00535         if (_firstAhcalModulesVec.size() > 0 && _lastAhcalModulesVec.size() > 0)
00536           {
00537             EVENT::ClusterVec goodClusters;
00538 
00539             for (unsigned int iCluster = 0; iCluster < clusterVec.size(); ++iCluster)
00540               {
00541                 int ngoodin  = 0;
00542                 int ngoodout = 0;
00543 
00544                 CalorimeterHitVec hitVec = clusterVec[iCluster]->getCalorimeterHits();
00545                 for (unsigned int iHits = 0; iHits < hitVec.size(); ++iHits)
00546                   {
00547                     const int cellID = hitVec[iHits]->getCellID0();
00548                     const int module = _mapper->getModuleFromCellID(cellID);
00549 
00550                     LCIntVec::iterator searchIfFirstModule = find(_firstAhcalModulesVec.begin(),
00551                                                                   _firstAhcalModulesVec.end(),
00552                                                                   module);
00553                     LCIntVec::iterator searchIfLastModule = find(_lastAhcalModulesVec.begin(),
00554                                                                  _lastAhcalModulesVec.end(),
00555                                                                  module);
00556 
00557                     if (searchIfFirstModule != _firstAhcalModulesVec.end()) ngoodin++;
00558                     if (searchIfLastModule  != _lastAhcalModulesVec.end())  ngoodout++;
00559                   }/*-------- end loop over track hits ---------------------*/
00560 
00561                 if ((ngoodin > 1) && (ngoodout > 1))
00562                   goodClusters.push_back(clusterVec[iCluster]);
00563                 else delete clusterVec[iCluster];
00564 
00565               }/*------------ end loop over track clusters -----------------*/
00566 
00567             return goodClusters;
00568           }
00569         else
00570           {
00571             streamlog_out(ERROR)<<"PERPENDICULAR tracks chosen, but no first/last AHCAL modules list given"<<endl;
00572             exit(1);
00573           }
00574       }/*-------------------------- end of PERPENDICUALR mode --------------------------------------------*/
00575 
00576     else if (trackSelectionMode == "NHITS")
00577       {
00578         EVENT::ClusterVec goodClusters;
00579         for (unsigned int iCluster = 0; iCluster < clusterVec.size(); ++iCluster)
00580           {
00581             CalorimeterHitVec hitVec = clusterVec[iCluster]->getCalorimeterHits();
00582             if (hitVec.size() > (unsigned int)_trackNoHitsThreshold)
00583               {
00584                 streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"The found track reaches the threshold of "<< _trackNoHitsThreshold
00585                              <<" hits and has "<<hitVec.size()<<endl;
00586                 goodClusters.push_back(clusterVec[iCluster]);
00587               }
00588             else
00589               {
00590                 delete clusterVec[iCluster];
00591                 streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"The found track does NOT reach the threshold of "<< _trackNoHitsThreshold
00592                              <<" hits and has "<<hitVec.size()<<" hits"<<endl;
00593               }
00594           }/*----------------------- end loop over track clusters ----------------------------------------*/
00595 
00596         return goodClusters;
00597       }/*--------------------------- end of NHITS mode ---------------------------------------------------*/
00598     /*---------------------------- if no TrackSelectionMode ----------------------------------------------*/
00599     else
00600       {
00601         streamlog_out(ERROR)<<"No TrackSelectionMode chosen, aborting..."<<endl;
00602         exit(1);
00603       }
00604   }
00605 
00606   /******************************************************************************/
00607   /*                                                                            */
00608   /*                                                                            */
00609   /*                                                                            */
00610   /******************************************************************************/
00611   ClusterImpl* MipTrackFinder::getWholeTrack(Cluster *trackCluster)
00612   {
00613     float meanXOfTrack = 0;
00614     float meanYOfTrack = 0;
00615 
00616     CalorimeterHitVec hitVec = trackCluster->getCalorimeterHits();
00617     for (unsigned int iHits = 0; iHits < hitVec.size(); ++iHits)
00618       {
00619         meanXOfTrack += hitVec[iHits]->getPosition()[0];
00620         meanYOfTrack += hitVec[iHits]->getPosition()[1];
00621       }/*------------ end loop over track clusters -----------------*/
00622 
00623     meanXOfTrack /= hitVec.size();
00624     meanYOfTrack /= hitVec.size();
00625 
00626     delete trackCluster;
00627 
00628     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" Mean X: "<<meanXOfTrack<<" mean Y: "<<meanYOfTrack<<endl;
00629 
00630     ClusterImpl *wholeTrack = new ClusterImpl();
00631 
00632     EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec::iterator iter;
00633     for (iter = _allAhcalHitsInEventVec.begin(); iter != _allAhcalHitsInEventVec.end(); ++iter)
00634       {
00635         float differenceInX = fabs((*iter)->getPosition()[0] - meanXOfTrack);
00636         float differenceInY = fabs((*iter)->getPosition()[1] - meanYOfTrack);
00637 
00638         streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<" differenceInX: "<<differenceInX<<" differenceInY: "<<differenceInY<<endl;
00639 
00640         /*be aware of the misalignment information in the future*/
00641         if (differenceInX < 16 && differenceInY < 16)
00642           {
00643             streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" Added hit to the track"<<endl;
00644             wholeTrack->addHit((*iter), 1.);
00645           }
00646       }/*----------------- end loop over all AHCAL hits in the event*/
00647 
00648     return wholeTrack;
00649   }
00650   /******************************************************************************/
00651   /*                                                                            */
00652   /*                                                                            */
00653   /*                                                                            */
00654   /******************************************************************************/
00655   EVENT::ClusterVec MipTrackFinder::getRemainingHits(EVENT::ClusterVec selectedTrackClusters)
00656   {
00657     EVENT::ClusterVec outputClusterVec;
00658 
00659     for (unsigned int iCluster = 0; iCluster < selectedTrackClusters.size(); ++iCluster)
00660       {
00661         outputClusterVec.push_back(this->getWholeTrack(selectedTrackClusters[iCluster]));
00662       }/*--------------------- end loop over track clusters -----------------*/
00663 
00664     return outputClusterVec;
00665   }
00666   /******************************************************************************/
00667   /*                                                                            */
00668   /*                                                                            */
00669   /*                                                                            */
00670   /******************************************************************************/
00671   void MipTrackFinder::appendParameters(LCEvent *evt, EVENT::ClusterVec finalVec)
00672   {
00673 
00674     int nTracks = 0; // number of tracks found in event
00675     int maxTrack_hits = 0; // maximum track length in event
00676 
00677     // get number of found tracks
00678     nTracks = (int)finalVec.size();
00679 
00680     // loop over all found tracks
00681     for (int iCluster = 0; iCluster < nTracks; ++iCluster) {
00682 
00683       if ( (int)((finalVec[iCluster])->getCalorimeterHits()).size() > maxTrack_hits ) {
00684         maxTrack_hits = (int)((finalVec[iCluster])->getCalorimeterHits()).size();
00685       }
00686 
00687     }
00688 
00689     /* append event parameters */
00690     evt->parameters().setValue(name()+"_nTracks", nTracks);
00691     evt->parameters().setValue(name()+"_maxTrack_hits", maxTrack_hits);
00692 
00693   }
00694   /******************************************************************************/
00695   /*                                                                            */
00696   /*                                                                            */
00697   /*                                                                            */
00698   /******************************************************************************/
00699   void MipTrackFinder::createOutputCollection(LCEvent *evt, EVENT::ClusterVec finalVec)
00700   {
00701     LCCollection *outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::CLUSTER);
00702     /*Need to set the flag; for more details, see:
00703       http://forum.linearcollider.org/index.php?t=msg&th=323&rid=0&S=857c8d1096e8bdfbb539fd560de6b468
00704     */
00705     outputCol->setFlag(outputCol->getFlag() | (1 << LCIO::CLBIT_HITS));
00706 
00707     for (unsigned int iCluster = 0; iCluster < finalVec.size(); ++iCluster)
00708       {
00709         outputCol->addElement(finalVec[iCluster]);
00710 
00711       }
00712     evt->addCollection(outputCol, _ahcalOutputTrackColName);
00713 
00714     streamlog_out(DEBUG4)<<"\n Found "<<outputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" tracks."<<endl;
00715   }
00716 
00717 }
